text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222592004 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical stage group allowable value)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222593009 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological stage group allowable value (qualifier value))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222594003 (American Joint Committee on Cancer yp stage group allowable value (qualifier value))

name: TNMStageGroupVS
title: TNM Stage Group Value Set
publisher: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

contact.name: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description: Result values for cancer stage group using TNM staging. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for Stage Group, according to TNM staging rules.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
